headlines.headline: 'The Hoop Collective': Episodes of Brian Windhorst's NBA podcast
headlines.description: From breaking news to the latest intel from around the NBA, here are the biggest highlights from Brian Windhorst's "The Hoop Collective" podcast.

headlines.headline: What this NBA trade deadline revealed: A disguised tanking strategy
headlines.description: Much to the irritation of some league insiders, the trade deadline was more than just a flurry of moves: It showed the next evolution in teams racing to the bottom.

headlines.headline: What's ahead for Giannis Antetokounmpo and the Milwaukee Bucks?
headlines.description: The trade deadline passed Thursday, and Giannis Antetokounmpo is still on the Bucks. What's next for Milwaukee and its superstar?

headlines.headline: LeBron James has 20 points, 10 assists to lead Luka-less Lakers past Warriors
headlines.description: â€” LeBron James had 20 points, 10 assists and seven rebounds to help the Los Angeles Lakers beat the Golden Stats Warriors 105-99 on Saturday night.

headlines.headline: Minnesota and Atlanta meet for non-conference matchup
headlines.description: Atlanta Hawks (26-28, ninth in the Eastern Conference) vs. Minnesota Timberwolves (32-22, sixth in the Western Conference)

headlines.headline: Miami plays Utah in non-conference action
headlines.description: Utah Jazz (16-37, 13th in the Western Conference) vs. Miami Heat (28-26, eighth in the Eastern Conference)

headlines.headline: Stephen A.: Drake Maye never had a chance
headlines.description: Stephen A. Smith felt sorry for the Patriots' defense and Drake Maye during their loss to the Seahawks.

headlines.headline: Why do Super Bowl winners go to Disney?
headlines.description: The Super Bowl and Disney parks have had a pop culture connection for decades. How did the NFL tradition begin? Check out more information now.

headlines.headline: Falcons' Pearce allegedly crashed SUV into WNBA player's car
headlines.description: Falcons rookie James Pearce Jr. allegedly crashed his vehicle into one being driven by WNBA player Rickea Jackson multiple times and struck a police officer with the vehicle while evading arrest, according to the criminal complaint obtained by ESPN.

headlines.headline: Orlovsky: Darnold the 'greatest QB redemption story the NFL's ever seen'
headlines.description: Dan Orlovsky argues that Sam Darnold played well in the Super Bowl and that Darnold is the greatest quarterback redemption story the NFL has ever seen.

headlines.headline: Does Mike Macdonald deserve more credit for Seahawks' success?
headlines.description: Adam Schefter, Domonique Foxworth, Dan Orlovsky and Peter Schrager discuss Mike Macdonald's impact on the Seahawks.

headlines.headline: Seahawks, Rams favored in wide-open Super Bowl LXI field
headlines.description: The Seahawks are tied with the Rams at +950 to win Super Bowl LXI, followed by the Bills at +1100, and the Eagles, Ravens and Patriots tied at +1300, according to DraftKings odds.

headlines.headline: Can the U.S. beat Canada for a men's hockey gold medal?
headlines.description: Here's why it makes sense -- and why it would help the sport more than another Canadian win.

headlines.headline: What are the winningest regions in sports?
headlines.description: The Los Angeles Dodgers won back-to-back World Series titles in 2024 and 2025. Which areas and leagues in North America have the most sports titles?

headlines.headline: Auston Matthews named U.S. men's hockey captain at Olympics
headlines.description: Auston Matthews has been named captain for Team USA's men's hockey team at the 2026 Olympics.

headlines.headline: Olympic hockey betting odds: Canada favored to win men's gold, USA favored to win women's
headlines.description: Who are the favorites and underdogs heading into the men's and women's 2026 Olympic ice hockey tournaments?

headlines.headline: Czechia loses Bruins' Pavel Zacha for Olympics due to injury
headlines.description: Czechia has to do without Pavel Zacha at the Milan Cortina Games as the Boston Bruins center will not recover in time from injury for the Olympic hockey tournament in a blow for the Czechs.

headlines.headline: Felony charge against top NHL prospect Gavin McKenna dropped
headlines.description: Penn State hockey star Gavin McKenna will have his felony aggravated assault charge dropped, the Centre County District Attorney's Office announced Friday.
